name: SunCup
description:
Small solar-driven boat game developped during the BBQGameJam 2018.

You can start a race and shoot laser beams at your enemys to slow them down (using space key). But beware of shadows because they will slow you down since less energy is provided in the dark! Also firing your laser beam reduces your energy available for acceleration!

You can either download the Unity 2018 source code or the build for win64. When downloading the unity source, you may want to start the RiverRace scene which contains the main demo level, the other scenes were used for development purposes.

Enjoy!

Developers: Christopher, Dimitri, Alex, Loris, Patrick, Laura
